verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that <S%H5012>prophesy<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> thou unto them that <S%H5030>prophesy<s%> out of their own <S%H3820>hearts<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> ye the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>;

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; <S%H1945>Woe<s%> unto the <S%H5036>foolish<s%> <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, that <S%H1980%H310>follow<s%> their own <S%H7307>spirit<s%>, and have <S%H7200>seen<s%> nothing!
O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, thy <S%H5030>prophets<s%> are like the <S%H7776>foxes<s%> in the <S%H2723>deserts<s%>.

Ye have not gone <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H6556>gaps<s%>, neither made <S%H1443>up<s%> the <S%H1447>hedge<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

They have <S%H2372>seen<s%> <S%H7723>vanity<s%> and <S%H3577>lying<s%> <S%H7081>divination<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%>: and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath not <S%H7971>sent<s%> them: and they have made others to <S%H3176>hope<s%> that they would <S%H6965>confirm<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%>.

Have ye not <S%H2372>seen<s%> a <S%H7723>vain<s%> <S%H4236>vision<s%>, and have ye not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> a <S%H3577>lying<s%> <S%H4738>divination<s%>, whereas ye <S%H559>say<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> it; albeit I have not <S%H559>spoken<s%>?

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Because ye have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H7723>vanity<s%>, and <S%H2372>seen<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%>, therefore, behold, I am against you, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.

And mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall be upon the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> that <S%H2374>see<s%> <S%H7723>vanity<s%>, and that <S%H7080>divine<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%>: they shall not be in the <S%H5475>assembly<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>, neither shall they be <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H3791>writing<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, neither shall they <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.

¶ Because, even because they have <S%H2937>seduced<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H7965>Peace<s%>; and there was no <S%H7965>peace<s%>; and one built <S%H1129>up<s%> a <S%H2434>wall<s%>, and, <S%H2009>lo<s%>, others <S%H2902>daubed<s%> it with <S%H8602>untempered<s%> morter:

<S%H559>Say<s%> unto them which <S%H2902>daub<s%> it with <S%H8602>untempered<s%> morter, that it shall <S%H5307>fall<s%>: there shall be an <S%H7857>overflowing<s%> <S%H1653>shower<s%>; and <S%H859>ye<s%>, O great <S%H417%H68>hailstones<s%>, shall <S%H5307>fall<s%>; and a <S%H5591>stormy<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> shall <S%H1234>rend<s%> it.
Lo, when the <S%H7023>wall<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen<s%>, shall it not be <S%H559>said<s%> unto you, Where is the <S%H2915>daubing<s%> wherewith ye have <S%H2902>daubed<s%> it?

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; I will even <S%H1234>rend<s%> it with a <S%H5591>stormy<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> in my <S%H2534>fury<s%>; and there shall be an <S%H7857>overflowing<s%> <S%H1653>shower<s%> in mine <S%H639>anger<s%>, and great <S%H417%H68>hailstones<s%> in my <S%H2534>fury<s%> to <S%H3617>consume<s%> it.

So will I break <S%H2040>down<s%> the <S%H7023>wall<s%> that ye have <S%H2902>daubed<s%> with <S%H8602>untempered<s%> morter, and <S%H5060>bring<s%> it down to the <S%H776>ground<s%>, so that the <S%H3247>foundation<s%> thereof shall be <S%H1540>discovered<s%>, and it shall <S%H5307>fall<s%>, and ye shall be <S%H3615>consumed<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> thereof: and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Thus will I <S%H3615>accomplish<s%> my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> upon the <S%H7023>wall<s%>, and upon them that have <S%H2902>daubed<s%> it with <S%H8602>untempered<s%> morter, and will <S%H559>say<s%> unto you, The <S%H7023>wall<s%> is no more, neither they that <S%H2902>daubed<s%> it;

To wit, the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> which <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> concerning <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and which <S%H2374>see<s%> <S%H2377>visions<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> for her, and there is no <S%H7965>peace<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.

¶ Likewise, thou <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H7760>set<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> against the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, which <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> out of their own <S%H3820>heart<s%>; and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> thou against them,

And <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to the women that <S%H8609>sew<s%> <S%H3704>pillows<s%> to all <S%H679%H3027>armholes<s%>, and <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H4555>kerchiefs<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of every <S%H6967>stature<s%> to <S%H6679>hunt<s%> <S%H5315>souls<s%>! Will ye <S%H6679>hunt<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and will ye <S%H2421>save<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> <S%H2421>alive<s%> that come unto you?

And will ye <S%H2490>pollute<s%> me among my <S%H5971>people<s%> for <S%H8168>handfuls<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> and for <S%H6595>pieces<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>, to <S%H4191>slay<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> that should not <S%H4191>die<s%>, and to <S%H2421>save<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> <S%H2421>alive<s%> that should not <S%H2421>live<s%>, by your <S%H3576>lying<s%> to my <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H8085>hear<s%> your <S%H3577>lies<s%>?

Wherefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Behold, I am against your <S%H3704>pillows<s%>, wherewith <S%H859>ye<s%> there <S%H6679>hunt<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> to make them <S%H6524>fly<s%>, and I will <S%H7167>tear<s%> them from your <S%H2220>arms<s%>, and will let the <S%H5315>souls<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>, even the <S%H5315>souls<s%> that ye <S%H6679>hunt<s%> to make them <S%H6524>fly<s%>.

Your <S%H4555>kerchiefs<s%> also will I <S%H7167>tear<s%>, and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> out of your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and they shall be no more in your <S%H3027>hand<s%> to be <S%H4686>hunted<s%>; and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Because with <S%H8267>lies<s%> ye have made the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H3512>sad<s%>, whom I have not made <S%H3510>sad<s%>; and <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H7451>wicked<s%>, that he should not <S%H7725>return<s%> from his <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>, by promising him <S%H2421>life<s%>:

Therefore ye shall <S%H2372>see<s%> no more <S%H7723>vanity<s%>, nor <S%H7080>divine<s%> <S%H7081>divinations<s%>: for I will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> out of your <S%H3027>hand<s%>: and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
